name: Da Fridge's Adventures 2
description:
Step into the shoes of Fridge, a hotdog adventurer who discovers a world full of nonsense and angry food ready to kill you!

keyboard Commands:

  • Attack/Action: "Z"
  • Jump: "Space"
  • Pause : "P"
  • Cancel : "Esc"
  • Ok : "Enter"
  • Fullscreen On/Off : "F12"

Xbox Joystick Commands:

  • Attack/Action: "X"
  • Jump: "A"
  • Pause : "Start"
  • Cancel : "B"
  • Ok : "A"
